document_data.name: Temple of Shar
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of Shar''' was a temple dedicated to the goddess [[Shar]] in the city of [[Waterdeep]],{{Cite adventurers league/Purging the Blood|2}}
document_data.Location: This temple was located in the [[North Ward of Waterdeep|North Ward]] of Waterdeep.

Structure.Interior: The interior of the temple was dimly lit by [[torch]]light. Its main chamber of this measured {{SI|40|ft|long=yes}} by {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}} wide, while its domed ceiling was {{SI|30|ft}}. The main chamber also had stairs leading down to the temple's basement.

document_data.Activities: The temple's adherents were known to produce pamphlets for the public that lauded their goddess.{{Cite adventurers league/Purging the Blood|7}}
document_data.History:
Around [[1035 DR]], the Sharran clergy fell under the sway of a [[vampire]] who hid themselves within the temple's basement. Also around this time, the normally irreligious [[Hultmark]]s became frequent visitors to the temple, falling under the sway of its vampire.

Eventually, the vampire lord [[Artor Morlin]] noticed that vampire activity around the city had increased,{{Cite adventurers league/Purging the Blood|5}} This mission eventually lead them to the [[Hultmark Manor]], where [[Joy Hultmark]] informed them she suspects the Temple of Shar as being a vampire den. When the adventurers made their way to the temple they found the Hultmarks inside, debating whether or not to remain loyal to their master.
